FantasyMovies.title: Aquaman
FantasyMovies.description: Arthur Curry learns that he is the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, and must step forward to lead his people and be a hero to the world.
FantasyMovies.stars: Amber Heard, Nicole Kidman, Jason Momoa

FantasyMovies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
FantasyMovies.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
FantasyMovies.stars: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo

FantasyMovies.title: The Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
FantasyMovies.description: The second installment of the Fantastic Beasts series set in J.K. Rowling's Wizarding World featuring the adventures of magizoologist Newt Scamander.
FantasyMovies.stars: Eddie Redmayne, Katherine Waterston, Dan Fogler

FantasyMovies.title: The House With A Clock In Its Walls
FantasyMovies.description: A young orphan named Lewis Barnavelt aids his magical uncle in locating a clock with the power to bring about the end of the world.
FantasyMovies.stars: Jack Black, Cate Blanchett, Owen Vaccaro
